er","type":"address"}],"name":"previewExitFee","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"fee","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"netAmount","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"renounceOwnership","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"requestUnstake","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newTreasury","type":"address"}],"name":"setTreasury","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"shares","type":"uint256"}],"name":"sharesToGToken","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"pure","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"user","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"string","name":"reason","type":"string"}],"name":"slash","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"slashedAmount","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"stake","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"shares","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"stakes","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"stGTokenShares","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"slashedAmount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"stakedAt","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"unstakeRequestedAt","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"totalLocked","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{" stGToken (staked GToken) share system with:      - Slash-aware share calculation      - Multi-slasher support (Registry, SuperPaymaster)      - Lock management for multiple protocols (MySBT, SuperPaymaster, Registry)      - Configurable exit fees (time-based tiers or flat rate)      - Low minimum stake (0.01 GT, like Lido's no minimum)      - Treasury for protocol fees Architecture: - Users stake GT \u2192 receive stGToken shares - Protocols (MySBT, SuperPaymaster, Registry) lock user's stGToken - Users can't unstake while locked - Unlocking charges exit fees \u2192 treasury - Registry and SuperPaymaster can slash for malicious behavior v2.0: Lido-compliant architecture with governance slash","errors":{"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract)."}],"AddressInsufficientBalance(address)":[{"details":"The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation."}],"FailedInnerCall()":[{"details":"A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC20 token failed."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"authorizeSlasher(address,bool)":{"params":{"authorized":"Whether to authorize or revoke","slasher":"Slasher contract address"}},"availableBalance(address)":{"params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"available Available stGToken shares"}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"This automatically reflects slash penalties","params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"balance":"Current balance in GT equivalent"}},"calculateExitFee(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"v2.1: Percentage-based fee with min/max protection      Example: feeRateBps=100 (1%), minExitFee=0.01 ether, maxFeePercent=500 (5%)      - unlock 100 GT \u2192 fee = 1 GT (1%)      - unlock 0.5 GT \u2192 fee = 0.01 GT (minExitFee, 2%)      - unlock 1000 GT with 10% rate \u2192 fee = 50 GT (capped at 5%)","params":{"locker":"Locker contract address","unlockAmount":"Amount being unlocked (in stGToken shares)","user":"User address"},"returns":{"fee":"Exit fee in stGToken shares"}},"calculateShares(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of GToken"},"returns":{"shares":"Estimated stGToken shares"}},"configureLocker(address,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256[],uint256[],address)":{"details":"v2.1: Percentage-based fees with min/max protection Example for MySBT (simple percentage):   feeRateBps = 100 (1%)   minExitFee = 0.01 ether   maxFeePercent = 500 (5%)   timeTiers = []   tierFees = [] Example for SuperPaymaster (time-based tiered):   feeRateBps = 0 (ignored when timeTiers set)   minExitFee = 0.01 ether   maxFeePercent = 500 (5%)   timeTiers = [90 days, 180 days, 365 days]   tierFees = [150, 100, 70, 50] (1.5%, 1%, 0.7%, 0.5% in bps)   (< 90d: 1.5%, 90-180d: 1%, 180-365d: 0.7%, \u2265365d: 0.5%)","params":{"authorized":"Whether authorized to lock stakes","feeRateBps":"Exit fee rate in basis points (100 = 1%, max 500 = 5%)","feeRecipient":"Address to receive exit fees (address(0) = use treasury)","locker":"Locker contract address","maxFeePercent":"Maximum fee as % of unlock amount (500 = 5%)","minExitFee":"Minimum exit fee (e.g., 0.01 ether to prevent dust attacks)","tierFees":"Array of fee rates (in bps) for each time tier (optional)","timeTiers":"Array of time thresholds in seconds (optional, for tiered fees)"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_gtoken":"GToken ERC20 contract address"}},"gTokenToShares(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"GT amount"},"returns":{"_0":"shares stGToken shares"}},"getGlobalStats()":{"details":"Note: totalSlashed removed - slash is now tracked per-user in StakeInfo.slashedAmount","returns":{"_totalShares":"Total stGToken shares","_totalStaked":"Total GToken staked (gross amount)","effectiveValue":"Value per share (scaled by 1e18)"}},"getLockInfo(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract","user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"lockInfo Complete lock information"}},"getLockedStake(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract address (Registry or SuperPaymaster)","user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"amount Locked stGToken shares"}},"getLockerConfig(address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker address"},"returns":{"_0":"config Complete locker configuration"}},"getStakeInfo(address)":{"params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"info Complete stake information"}},"getUnstakeTimeRemaining(address)":{"params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"remaining":"Seconds remaining (0 if can unstake)"}},"lockStake(address,uint256,string)":{"details":"Called by authorized lockers (MySBT, SuperPaymaster, etc.)","params":{"amount":"Amount of stGToken shares to lock","purpose":"Lock purpose description","user":"User whose stake to lock"}},"lockedBalanceBy(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract address","user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"amount Locked stGToken shares"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"previewExitFee(address,address)":{"params":{"locker":"Locker contract","user":"User address"},"returns":{"fee":"Exit fee in stGToken shares","netAmount":"Net amount after fee (in stGToken shares)"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"requestUnstake()":{"details":"User must wait UNSTAKE_DELAY before calling unstake()"},"setTreasury(address)":{"params":{"newTreasury":"New treasury address"}},"sharesToGToken(uint256)":{"params":{"shares":"stGToken shares"},"returns":{"_0":"amount GT amount"}},"slash(address,uint256,string)":{"details":"\u2705 REDESIGNED: User-level slash - only affects the specific user, not other stakers      Increases user's StakeInfo.slashedAmount, reducing only their balanceOf value      Called by Registry or SuperPaymaster for malicious/failing operators","params":{"amount":"Amount of GToken to slash","reason":"Slash reason","user":"User to slash"},"returns":{"slashedAmount":"Actual amount slashed (may be less if insufficient balance)"}},"stake(uint256)":{"details":"Share calculation:      - First stake: shares = amount      - Subsequent: shares = amount * totalShares / totalStaked","params":{"amount":"Amount of GToken to stake (must be >= 0.01 GT)"},"returns":{"shares":"Number of stGToken shares received"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"unlockStake(address,uint256)":{"details":"Called by locker when user exits (burns SBT, unregisters operator, etc.)      Exit fee is transferred to treasury","params":{"grossAmount":"Gross amount to unlock (before exit fee)","user":"User whose stake to unlock"},"returns":{"netAmount":"Net amount unlocked after exit fee deduction"}},"unstake()":{"details":"Returns actual balance (original amount minus proportional slash)      Reverts if stake is locked by any protocol"}},"title":"GTokenStaking with Lock Management and Slash System","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"GTOKEN()":{"notice":"GToken ERC20 contract address"},"MIN_STAKE()":{"notice":"Minimum stake amount: 0.01 GToken (Lido-like low barrier)"},"UNSTAKE_DELAY()":{"notice":"7-day delay before unstaking"},"VERSION()":{"notice":"Contract version string"},"VERSION_CODE()":{"notice":"Contract version code (major * 10000 + medium * 100 + minor)"},"authorizeSlasher(address,bool)":{"notice":"Authorize or revoke slasher (Registry, SuperPaymaster)"},"authorizedSlashers(address)":{"notice":"Authorized slashers (Registry, SuperPaymaster)"},"availableBalance(address)":{"notice":"Get available (unlocked) balance in stGToken shares"},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Query user's total stGToken balance (shares value after slash)"},"calculateExitFee(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate exit fee for a user's lock (percentage-based with min/max protection)"},"calculateShares(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate shares for given stake amount"},"configureLocker(address,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256[],uint256[],address)":{"notice":"Configure locker contract with percentage-based exit fee parameters"},"constructor":{"notice":"Initialize GTokenStaking contract"},"gTokenToShares(uint256)":{"notice":"Convert GT amount to stGToken shares"},"getGlobalStats()":{"notice":"Get global staking statistics"},"getLockInfo(address,address)":{"notice":"Get complete lock information"},"getLockedStake(address,address)":{"notice":"Get locked stake for user from specific locker (alias for lockedBalanceBy)"},"getLockerConfig(address)":{"notice":"Get locker configuration"},"getStakeInfo(address)":{"notice":"Get stake info for user"},"getUnstakeTimeRemaining(address)":{"notice":"Get time remaining for unstake delay"},"lockStake(address,uint256,string)":{"notice":"Lock user's stGToken for usage by authorized protocol"},"lockedBalanceBy(address,address)":{"notice":"Get locked balance by specific locker"},"lockerConfigs(address)":{"notice":"Locker configurations"},"locks(address,address)":{"notice":"Lock information: user => locker => LockInfo"},"previewExitFee(address,address)":{"notice":"Preview exit fee and net amount for user"},"requestUnstake()":{"notice":"Request unstake (starts 7-day delay)"},"setTreasury(address)":{"notice":"Set treasury address for exit fees"},"sharesToGToken(uint256)":{"notice":"Convert stGToken shares to GT amount"},"slash(address,uint256,string)":{"notice":"Execute slash on user (called by authorized slashers)"},"stake(uint256)":{"notice":"Stake GToken and receive stGToken shares"},"stakes(address)":{"notice":"User stake information"},"totalLocked(address)":{"notice":"Total locked per user"},"totalShares()":{"notice":"Total stGToken shares issued"},"totalStaked()":{"notice":"Total amount of GToken staked (gross, before per-user slashing)"},"treasury()":{"notice":"Default treasury for exit fees"},"unlockStake(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Unlock user's stGToken with exit fee"},"unstake()":{"notice":"Execute unstake after 7-day delay"}},"notice":"Enhanced staking contract following Lido calculateExitFee(address,address,uint256.details: v2.1: Percentage-based fee with min/max protection      Example: feeRateBps=100 (1%), minExitFee=0.01 ether, maxFeePercent=500 (5%)      - unlock 100 GT  fee = 1 GT (1%)      - unlock 0.5 GT  fee = 0.01 GT (minExitFee, 2%)      - unlock 1000 GT with 10% rate  fee = 50 GT (capped at 5%)

configureLocker(address,bool,uint256,uin.details: v2.1: Percentage-based fees with min/max protection Example for MySBT (simple percentage):   feeRateBps = 100 (1%)   minExitFee = 0.01 ether   maxFeePercent = 500 (5%)   timeTiers = []   tierFees = [] Example for SuperPaymaster (time-based tiered):   feeRateBps = 0 (ignored when timeTiers set)   minExitFee = 0.01 ether   maxFeePercent = 500 (5%)   timeTiers = [90 days, 180 days, 365 days]   tierFees = [150, 100, 70, 50] (1.5%, 1%, 0.7%, 0.5% in bps)   (< 90d: 1.5%, 90-180d: 1%, 180-365d: 0.7%, 365d: 0.5%)

params.feeRateBps: Exit fee rate in basis points (100 = 1%, max 500 = 5%)
params.feeRecipient: Address to receive exit fees (address(0) = use treasury)
params.maxFeePercent: Maximum fee as % of unlock amount (500 = 5%)
params.minExitFee: Minimum exit fee (e.g., 0.01 ether to prevent dust attacks)
params.tierFees: Array of fee rates (in bps) for each time tier (optional)
params.timeTiers: Array of time thresholds in seconds (optional, for tiered fees)

getGlobalStats().details: Note: totalSlashed removed - slash is now tracked per-user in StakeInfo.slashedAmount

lockStake(address,uint256,string).details: Called by authorized lockers (MySBT, SuperPaymaster, etc.)

params.amount: Amount of stGToken shares to lock

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns.netAmount: Net amount after fee (in stGToken shares)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestUnstake().details: User must wait UNSTAKE_DELAY before calling unstake()

slash(address,uint256,string).details: REDESIGNED: User-level slash - only affects the specific user, not other stakers      Increases user's StakeInfo.slashedAmount, reducing only their balanceOf value      Called by Registry or SuperPaymaster for malicious/failing operators

returns.slashedAmount: Actual amount slashed (may be less if insufficient balance)

stake(uint256).details: Share calculation:      - First stake: shares = amount      - Subsequent: shares = amount * totalShares / totalStaked

params.amount: Amount of GToken to stake (must be >= 0.01 GT)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unlockStake(address,uint256).details: Called by locker when user exits (burns SBT, unregisters operator, etc.)      Exit fee is transferred to treasury

params.grossAmount: Gross amount to unlock (before exit fee)

returns.netAmount: Net amount unlocked after exit fee deduction

unstake().details: Returns actual balance (original amount minus proportional slash)      Reverts if stake is locked by any protocol

MIN_STAKE().notice: Minimum stake amount: 0.01 GToken (Lido-like low barrier)

availableBalance(address).notice: Get available (unlocked) balance in stGToken shares

balanceOf(address).notice: Query user's total stGToken balance (shares value after slash)

calculateExitFee(address,address,uint256.notice: Calculate exit fee for a user's lock (percentage-based with min/max protection)

calculateShares(uint256).notice: Calculate shares for given stake amount

configureLocker(address,bool,uint256,uin.notice: Configure locker contract with percentage-based exit fee parameters

gTokenToShares(uint256).notice: Convert GT amount to stGToken shares

getLockedStake(address,address).notice: Get locked stake for user from specific locker (alias for lockedBalanceBy)

getUnstakeTimeRemaining(address).notice: Get time remaining for unstake delay

lockStake(address,uint256,string).notice: Lock user's stGToken for usage by authorized protocol

lockedBalanceBy(address,address).notice: Get locked balance by specific locker

previewExitFee(address,address).notice: Preview exit fee and net amount for user

setTreasury(address).notice: Set treasury address for exit fees

sharesToGToken(uint256).notice: Convert stGToken shares to GT amount

slash(address,uint256,string).notice: Execute slash on user (called by authorized slashers)

stake(uint256).notice: Stake GToken and receive stGToken shares

totalStaked().notice: Total amount of GToken staked (gross, before per-user slashing)

unlockStake(address,uint256).notice: Unlock user's stGToken with exit fee
